name: Space Pirate Infinity - Open Beta
description:
You have found an extremely rare teleporter in a wrecked spaceship and this may be your only chance to become as powerful as you always wanted to be. But there are two more teleporters in the universe..

Build your base to have access to the Galaxy Teleporter and go to the Narra Galaxy to hunt down the owner of the second teleporter.

The game is in heavy development but it is playable to an extent. Please share your opinions and if you find any bugs please report them to me.

The game will be free until its release on Steam. (in a few months)

www.spacepirateinfinity.com

Some hidden controls:
Q: Activate portable shield if you have any
Middle mouse button: Activate invisibilty if you have the module
